page.title: 07SOUTHWICK ESTATE MANAGER
page.content: The manager of Southwick Estate lives at Belney Farm. Each morning he gets up early and goes to check up on the animals. He then goes to any of the farms on the estate that need him. After lunch he continues to tour the estate helping out where necessary.The manager lives on the farm with his wife and two sons. His wife does not work on the farm but spins wool from the sheep reared on the estate. One of his sons drives a tractor and combine harvester, the other one is learning to be a farmer like his father. The manager has many hobbies including playing golf and snooker and watching football. Occasionally he has to go to the continent of Europe to see how other farms are working. Recently he went to West Germany to see some farms there.
